column2: Prominent market technician Ralph Acampora says the recent bout of market volatility has him uneasy and now he's forecasting a deeper drop in the market.
column4: ‘Godfather’ of technical analysis says the stock market could fall 20% or more, but don’t panic: ‘This market really, really did unbelievable’ for 18 months

column2: It's getting pretty ugly out there for the S&P 500. There are still places to make money — but if you're like most — you don't own much.
column4: You're Probably Missing Out On 10 Soaring Stocks Amid The Sell-Off
